name: Compadres - Main Line - Petit Corona
additionalNotes: Compadres Cigars is a brand of GEO Foods, founded by Spencer Woodard, with experience in imports and exports in Latin America. With José Suárez as the leader in the Dominican Republic, special blends of high quality cigars were created. After extensive market testing, Compadres Cigars now offers a complete line of premium cigars supervised from production to distribution, ensuring excellence and customer satisfaction.
